Posts.EditableText: Yeah, that's it. I want to stop smoking too so let's go shop at your store with your free advertisement. When you smoke, be sure to put out your burning cigarette into a small cup of gasoline so you do not bother the second-hand smokers. The only way to avoid spamming idiots like this is to have a forum where only members can leave messages. I'm not exactly fond of that idea because sometimes I'm lazy and don't feel like signing in. I'm just stating the facts...
